text: The 2019 CS Lombardia Trophy was held in September 2019 in Bergamo, Italy. It was part of the 2019–20 ISU Challenger Series. Medals were awarded in the disciplines of men's singles, ladies' singles, and ice dance. ==Entries== The International Skating Union published the list of entries on August 19, 2019. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Country ! Men ! Ladies !
